Poem #1 By Matt
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Assorted Non-Monster Rancher Fiction: Poem #1 By Matt
By MrMatt3000 on Wednesday, January 23, 2002 - 04:50 am:

Forever Lost

When the days were full of life,
And the nights meant new beginnings,
I loved her…
When all my life mattered
Was to make her happy,
She loved me.
I now look down at the tears of the past.
As the winds of change steadily blow.
Her passion for me vanished as quickly as it came…
And now I am alone…
To weep in my solitude.
Doves soar no more.
And the sky is green with envy.
She looked me in the eyes…
And shattered my hopes and dreams.
She mercilessly ended my life
And began my death.
The rose became wilted,
On the last serene day in my life.
While I stand atop the cliff…
I see my freedom.
To be a dove…
And live my life as a never-waking dream,
As I always had…
I now entrust my life to the wind…
Like I did to her…before she pierced my will.
Down the fallen angel soars…
Down to where he might find happiness,
Or end the sadness.
Love is no more,
As death becomes me!
Let the tears stop!
End the pain once and for all!
I have lost her…forever…

One of my better pieces of work, but a little old. I will post a better one soon!

~~~The Mattman~~~
